otherNightReminder: The Wurm points to a player. That player dies.
name: Wurm
ability: Each night*, choose a player: they die. Your alive neighbours might die at any time.
flavor: These terrifying creatures burrow beneath the ground, listening for the sounds of footsteps above. The only mercy offered by these creatures is the tell-tale hiss of their approach, thus allowing would-be victims a moment to prepare for the oncoming attack.
